summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness against the General Fund of The City of Seattle, in the sum of One Hundred Nine and 08/100 Dollars ($109.08), for the purpose of completing the improvement of the Alley in Block 106, A. A. Denny's Addition, by grading, as authorized by Ordinance No. 21814, creating Local Improvement District No. 2193.
